items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library for converting decimals and strings into accessible, screen-reader-friendly fractions. Generate MathML for enhanced accessibility and ensure inclusive fraction display on the web.

items.content_html: Ultra Mega Enumerator is a lightweight library designed to enumerate various combinatorial objects. Its goal is to provide efficient tools for generating combinations, permutations, compositions, partitions, and more.

items.content_html: Minimal Notes is a lightweight and intuitive notes application built with TypeScript and Node.js. It allows users to create, edit, delete, and search notes efficiently. The app features a clean user interface, persistent storage, and a seamless experience for managing notes.
items.title: AmarNafais/Minimal-Notes: Minimal Notes is a lightweight and intuitive notes application built with TypeScript and Node.js. It allows users to create, edit, delete, and search notes efficiently. The app features a clean user interface, persistent storage, and a seamless experience for managing notes.
